title: 想係newegg升級硬件但想知砌唔砌到

replies.msg:
自己部腦硬件如下:

CPU Name Intel® Core™ i5-6500 CPU @ 3.20GHz
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Motherboard MSI B150A GAMING PRO (MS-7978)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
RAM Type Dual Channel (128 bit) DDR4-SDRAM
Slot #1 Module Kingston 8192 MB (DDR4-2137) - P/N: 9905625-030.A00G
Slot #2 Module Kingston 8192 MB (DDR4-2137) - P/N: 9905678-139.A00G
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
GPU Type NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (GM204) @ 135 MHz
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PSU Model Acbel iPower 90m 700W 80+Gold

如果想係 NEWEGG換好D的 CPU (I5 OR I7)
I5的話 https://www.newegg.com/global/hk-en/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16819117959&ignorebbr=1
I7 就要連板換埋, 未有心水

RAM 加到 32GB
https://www.newegg.com/global/hk-en/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16820232476&ignorebbr=1
當然我知道我本身有2條行2137的廢RAM, 會令到新的2條行唔到3200
果2條我出年會換。

GPU 換 1070級別
https://www.newegg.com/global/hk-en/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16814487259&ignorebbr=1

買番來之後就咁換有無問題??

CPU用唔到
RAM 買來哂氣，你塊板只可以用2133MHz
顯示卡用到
